mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMM_QNA (BOARD_ID, comment_no, MEMBER_ID, SUBSTANCE, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT) VALUES (#{boardId}, NVL((SELECT MAX(comment_no) FROM COMM_QNA), 0) + 1, #{memberId}, #{substance}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO COMM_QNA (BOARD_ID, comment_no, MEMBER_ID, SUBSTANCE, REGIST_DT, LAST_UPD_DT, REF_comment_no) VALUES (#{boardId}, NVL((SELECT MAX(comment_no) FROM COMM_QNA), 0) + 1, #{memberId}, #{substance}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{refCommentId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comm_QNA WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} START WITH REF_COMMENT_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_no = REF_COMMENT_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_no
